edu.lehigh.cse.lol

Class LoseScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • QuickScene
      • edu.lehigh.cse.lol.LoseScene

  • public class LoseScene
extends QuickScene
    LoseScene provides a way to display text and images after a level is lost, before gameplay resumes. A LoseScene can include arbitrary text and pictures. Every level gets a PostScene automatically, but it can be disabled.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LoseScene()
      Construct by setting the default lose text

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void dismiss()
      This runs when the LoseScene is cleared, and restarts the level
      static LoseScene get()
      Get the LoseScene that is configured for the current level, or create a blank one if none exists.
      void setDefaultText(java.lang.String text)
      Set the text that should be drawn, centered, when the level is lost

        public void setDefaultText(java.lang.String text)
        Set the text that should be drawn, centered, when the level is lost
        Parameters:
